Project 2 - Literary Music Series

September 2, 2020

We are excited to be part of Natalie Vargas Nedvetsky’s Literary Music Series. The Literary Music Series “champions the joining of all art forms and promotes their integration into the way we think and live our lives.”

We will be exploring themes of unity, isolation, and what is at stake if we choose to neglect the hard conversations. We are exited to collaborate with award winning fictional author and poet Patricia McCrystal.

More details to come!

Check out the series here: Literary Music Series
